function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of person-to-person transmission in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Minimize the number of people within the same indoor environment","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, social distancing measures","People":"Occupants in indoor environments","Owner":"Building administrators, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of clear guidelines for safe occupancy numbers in indoor spaces","Impact":"Difficulty in controlling concentration of virus-laden particles","Mitigation":"Develop clear guidelines for safe occupancy numbers based on ventilation rate and efficiency","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air quality monitoring","People":"Public health authorities, building administrators","Owner":"Public health authorities, building administrators"},{"Description":"Risk of airborne transmission in public transportation systems","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission in crowded transportation","Mitigation":"Reducing the number of people using public or private transport at the same time","Technologies":"Transport scheduling, ventilation systems","People":"Public transportation users","Owner":"Transport authorities, public health authorities"}]}
